verses.arabic: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...
verses.transliteration: Qaaaf; wal Qur aanil Majeed

verses.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.arabicSimple: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.
verses.transliteration: Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."
verses.transliteration: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed

segments.translation: What! When we die and have become dust
That is a return far

verses.arabic: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
verses.arabicSimple: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
verses.translation: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.
verses.transliteration: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul-ardu minhum wa 'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez

segments.arabic: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ
segments.translation: Certainly We know what diminishes the earth of them
segments.transliteration: qad ʿalim'nā mā tanquṣu l-arḍu min'hum

segments.translation: and with Us is a Book guarded

verses.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.arabicSimple: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.
verses.transliteration: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.arabicSimple: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?
verses.transliteration: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa wa zaiyannaahaa wa maa lahaa min furooj

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,
verses.transliteration: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim baheej

verses.arabic: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.arabicSimple: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].
verses.transliteration: Tabsiratanw wa zikraa likulli 'abdim muneeb

verses.arabic: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest
verses.transliteration: Wa nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw wa habbal haseed

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -
verses.transliteration: Wannakhla baasiqaatil laha tal'un nadeed

verses.arabic: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
verses.arabicSimple: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.
verses.transliteration: Rizqal lil'ibaad, wa ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj

segments.arabic: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ
segments.translation: A provision for the slaves and We give life therewith to a land dead
segments.transliteration: riz'qan lil'ʿibādi wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytan

segments.translation: Thus will be the coming forth

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.arabicSimple: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa Ashaabur Rassi wa Samood

verses.arabic: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot
verses.transliteration: Wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu wikhwaanu loot

verses.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.
verses.transliteration: Wa Ashaabul Aykati wa qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed

segments.translation: And the companions of the wood and the people of Tubba
All denied the Messengers so was fulfilled My Threat

verses.arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.arabicSimple: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.
verses.transliteration: Afa'a yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed

segments.translation: Were We then tired with the creation the first

segments.arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
segments.translation: Nay they are in doubt about a creation new
segments.transliteration: bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana wa na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo wa Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wareed

segments.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ
segments.translation: And certainly We created man and We know what whispers to him his soul
segments.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā l-insāna wanaʿlamu mā tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu

segments.arabic: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
segments.translation: and We are nearer to him than his jugular vein his jugular vein
segments.transliteration: wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi min ḥabli l-warīdi

verses.arabic: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.
verses.transliteration: 'Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi yaani 'anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali qa'eed

verses.arabic: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].
verses.transliteration: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shaheed

segments.translation: And will come the stupor of death in truth
That is what you were [from it] avoiding

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
verses.transliteration: Wa nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed

segments.translation: And will be blown [in] the trumpet
That is the Day of the Warning

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shaheed

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."
verses.transliteration: Laqad kunta fee ghaf latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadeed

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."
verses.transliteration: Wa qaala qareenuhoo haazaa maa ladaiya 'ateed

verses.arabic: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.arabicSimple: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,
verses.transliteration: Alqiyaa fee Jahannama kulla kaffaarin 'aneed

verses.arabic: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.arabicSimple: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,
verses.transliteration: Mannaa'il lilkhayri mu'tadim mureeb

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."
verses.transliteration: Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa alqiyaahu fil'azaabish shadeed

verses.arabic: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."
verses.transliteration: Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo wa laakin kaana fee dalaahim ba'eed

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.
verses.transliteration: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed

verses.arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."
verses.transliteration: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya wa maaa ana bizal laamil lil'abeed

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"
verses.transliteration: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati wa taqoolu hal mim mazeed

verses.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,
verses.transliteration: Wa uzlifatil jannatu lil muttaqeena ghaira ba'eed

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.arabicSimple: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]
verses.transliteration: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez

verses.arabic: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.arabicSimple: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].
verses.transliteration: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi wa jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb

verses.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."
verses.transliteration: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin zaalika yawmul khulood

verses.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.
verses.transliteration: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa wa ladainaa mazeed

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?
verses.transliteration: Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fil bilaad, hal mim mahees

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].
verses.transliteration: Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a wa huwa shaheed

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin wa maa massanaa mil lughoob

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,
verses.transliteration: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi wa qablal ghuroob

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.
verses.transliteration: Wa minal laili fasabbih hu wa adbaaras sujood

verses.arabic: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -
verses.transliteration: Wastami' yawma yunaa dil munaadi mim makaanin qareeb

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].
verses.transliteration: Yawma yasmaoonas sai hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj

segments.translation: The Day they will hear the Blast in truth
That is the Day of coming forth

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination
verses.transliteration: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa ilainal maseer

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.arabicSimple: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.
verses.transliteration: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer

segments.translation: The Day will split the earth from them hurrying
That is a gathering for Us easy

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.arabicSimple: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.
verses.transliteration: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona wa maaa anta 'alihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil quraani many yakhaafu wa'eed

segments.translation: We know best [of] what they say
and not are you over them the one to compel
But remind with the Quran whoever fears My threat
